description: This file defines data classes, enums, and a provider class for project configuration and template initialization, including project types, configuration parameters, and methods to load and process configuration data.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration of supported project types, including frontend frameworks, backend frameworks, and databases.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Holds configuration details for project initialization, including name, version, description, author, project type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProcessingScript
classes.description: Represents post-processing scripts for project setup.

classes.name: BuildCommand
classes.description: Configuration for build commands, including command string and working directory.

classes.name: EnvironmentConfig
classes.description: Holds environment setup details such as versions of tools and SDKs.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Aggregates all information needed for project template initialization.

classes.name: TemplateConfigProvider
classes.description: Provides methods to load and process template configuration data from a YAML file.

methods.name: from_string
methods.description: Creates a ProjectType enum member from a string value.

methods.name: get_replaceable_parameters
methods.description: Returns a dictionary of parameters that can be used for template string replacements.

methods.name: replace_parameters
methods.description: Replaces placeholders in content with actual project parameters.

methods.name: get_init_info
methods.description: Loads and parses the YAML configuration file, returning a populated TemplateInitInfo object.
